text: The 2022 season will be the Miami Dolphins' 53rd in the National Football League (NFL) and their first under a new head coach, after the firing of Brian Flores at the end of the 2021 season. ==Draft== 2022 Miami Dolphins Draft Round Selection Player Position College 1 26 2 50 3 100 4 117 4 121 5 156 6 200 7 221 ==Regular season== ===2022 opponents=== Listed below are the Dolphins' opponents for 2022. Exact dates and times will be announced in the spring. Category Home Away Division opponents (AFC East) Buffalo Bills New England Patriots New York Jets Buffalo Bills New England Patriots New York Jets Conference opponents (AFC North) Cleveland Browns Pittsburgh Steelers Baltimore Ravens Cincinnati Bengals Conference opponents (based on division placement) Houston Texans Los Angeles Chargers Interconference opponents (NFC North) Green Bay Packers Minnesota Vikings Chicago Bears Detroit Lions Interconference opponent (based on 2021 division placement) San Francisco 49ers ===Standings=== ====Division==== ====Conference==== ==References== Miami Category:Miami Dolphins seasons
title: 2022 Miami Dolphins season
